pkgmetadata.longdescription: Functions for the Japanese Regional Mesh Codes ('JIS X 0410') // Functions for the Japanese regional mesh codes defined in 'JIS X 0410' (https://www.jisc.go.jp/app/jis/general/GnrJISNumberNam eSearchList?showjisStdNo=X0410). Conversion between regional mesh codes and longitude/latitude, and between mesh codes of different scales.
